data.title: Public & Commercial Scrap Metal Buyer and Container Service. Public Cash for Scrap Metal Recycling in Westport, MA. Highest Scrap Metal Prices Paid
data.text:
Public Cash Prices Here

Mid City Scrap is a wholesale & retail scrapyard located at 548 State Rd (Rt. 6) in Westport, MA

RETAIL: Mid City Scrap buys scrap metal for recycling purposes from the general public for cash. Unlike yards that exclusively pay via check or debit cards, Mid City Scrap has held to the long-standing tradition of paying in cash* for all ferrous and non-ferrous scrap metal from the public sector. To do so, Mid City has had to concentrate and invest in specific technologies including safety, information, and cash handling to ensure the highest level of customer satisfaction possible.

Please visit us and see how easy it is to help the environment while making some cash for yourself. From the time you are greeted at the scale and receive your ticket from our integrated scale/computer system to being directed where to offload your scrap by our yard safety spotter, until you cash out your ticket at one of our two cash dispensing machines, you will understand why our motto is “We work for You!”

Mid City aims to work with the public in the most efficient and transparent means possible which is why we publish our public cash buying prices daily.

*Cash transactions at or above $10,000.00 are subject to all legal requirements to be compliant with local, state, and federal regulation.

______________________________________________________________________________________________

WHOLESALE: Mid City Scrap maintains a fleet of trucks, drivers, and hundreds of containers to be used for scrap metal collection and logistics. We also have the administrative, financial, and physical resources to offer commercial, industrial, & municipal level recycling solutions of metal, fiber, & plastic to a wide range of partners. Mid City Scrap is also capable of providing specialized equipment and tailored services as required by each customer’s unique situation.

Mid City Scrap has the equipment, staff, resources, and capabilities to provide turnkey recycling solutions for almost every situation and size.

Established in 1951, Mid City Scrap has over half a century of scrap metal experience servicing the Massachusetts and Rhode Island area. Our long standing customers and partners include municipalities, large corporations, small businesses, and even entrepreneurs and professional scrap metal dealers. Please contact us today and allow us the opportunity to “Work for You!”

______________________________________________________________________________________________

______________________________________________________________________________________________

Mid City Scrap Iron & Salvage Co. Inc. is a member of the ISRI Circle of Safety Excellence (TM)
